House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04373
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR TAX RELIEF DURING TIMES OF CALAMITY

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-20
      2. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2017-01-31
          -A technical working group was created to study the bill, together with other bills of same import.
      3. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-01-31
          -To be consolidated with other bills of similar subject matter
      4. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-05-16
      5. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-05-29
          -Substitute bill was approved, in consolidation with other bills. Report to be submitted to the mother committee.

REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SOCIAL SERVICES ON 2016-11-21
